1370: Herman was born in Die lange straet1 in 1370.
Got married to Berta at age 29 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Berta, Sybillia, at age 30.
1374: Had a daughter with Berta, Gheesen, at age 33.
1376: Had a son with Berta, Lardies, at age 35.
1377: Had a son with Berta, Engelbertus, at age 36.
1378: Had a daughter with Berta, Cofte, at age 37.
1385: Had a son with Berta, Gobel, at age 44.
1386: Had a daughter with Berta, Truden, at age 45.
1387: Lost son Lardies when Lardies was 12 years old.
